name: Gillette Venus Extra Smooth Travel Razor Kit for Women, Mini Handle + Refill + Case
short_description: SMOOTH IN EVERY STROKE: The Venus Extra Smooth Razor gives you a close shave with up to 0% shave irritation
5-BLADE RAZOR: Each refill lasts up to 30 days based on 2x/week shave and delivers a long-lasting smooth
LUBRICATION STRIP: Glides over skin to help protect from shave irritation

COMPACT & PORTABLE: With a mini handle and travel case for on-the-go use. Easily fits into your purse or travel bag. The mini handle will fit any Venus blade refill (*Except Simply Venus and Venus for Pubic Hair and Skin)
WORLD'S #1 FEMALE RAZOR BRAND: More women choose Venus over any other razor brand
YOUR BEST SMOOTH: Use with your favorite Venus shave gel to reveal smooth skin
product_description: Venus female razor blades are designed with a woman's body in mind. Venus Extra Smooth On-The-Go women's razors come with a mini handle and travel case for on-the-go use. This razor features our Extra Smooth blade refill which delivers a close, controlled shave. The razor blade refills have 5 diamond-like coated blades, to closely cut hair with ease, for an extra smooth shave that lasts and a lubrastrip, with a touch of avocado oil, for smooth glide. Give yourself a long-lasting shave with 10x more lubrication (vs Venus Smooth). The razor blade refills also have a pivoting head that adjusts to your curves, including ankles and knees. No awkwardly angling your razor. These female razor blades cut hair closer to the skin, for a longer-lasting smooth (vs Venus Smooth razor for women). Each blade refill lasts up to 30 days of shaves (based on twice/week shave). The mini travel handle will fit any Venus razor blade refill cartridge (except Simply Venus and Venus Pubic Hair Razor). The mini handle is designed to last so you only need to change your blades.

name: Cosywell Travel Size Bottles for Toiletries 13 Pack 2oz TSA Approved Toiletry Bottles Leak Proof Travel Kit for Women Men TSA Clear Toiletry Bag Shampoo Lotion Skincare Cosmetic Container
short_description: Your satisfaction is always our top priority, we will do our best to meet your satisfaction. Leak Proof Travel Bottles Set: These travel size toiletries bottles are lightweight and space-saving. All of the travel size bottles are with a secure and tight seal, minimizing the risk of leaks or spills during travel. This is especially important for preventing any mess in your luggage or toiletry bag.

TSA Approved Toiletry Bottles: These smaller containers are designed specifically for travel purposes and are compliant with TSA regulations for carry-on a variety of liquids, making them the perfect travel companion for your favorite shampoo, conditioner, body wash, lotion, and other toiletries; The small plastic bottles can easily fit into any travel bag/purse, so you can bring your favorite cosmetics with you wherever you go.

Sturdy and High Quality Travel Set: Our travel containers for toiletries are made of high quality plastic, sturdy and portable. The clear bottles allows you to easily see the remaining amount, very helpful for monitoring how much product you have left and planning accordingly. The transparent toiletry bag is of excellent quality with strong stitching, suitable for daily storage and travel use.

Perfect Travel Size Containers: This travel set includes 2 x 2oz pump bottles, 1 x 2oz spray bottle, 1x 1.7oz spray bottle, 2 x 2oz travel bottles with flip caps, 2 x 15ml cream jars, 2 x spatulas, 1x funnel, 1x sticker label, 1 x PVC clear toiletry bag. Various size and bottles are perfect to meet your different needs and the toiletry bag provides a convenient way to store and transport them.

Versatile Usage for Multiple Toiletries: Perfect for storing products such as shampoo, conditioner, body wash, lotion, moisturizing water, hair spray, facial mist, perfume, and other liquid toiletries, face cream, etc. This is a travel set that can meet your needs in many ways. It is perfect for daily use, home, work, vacation trips, camping, beach, gym and other outdoor activities.

name: Schick Intuition Go Disposable Razor for Sensitive Skin, 1ct, Razors Sensitive Skin, Women’s Disposable Razors with Organic Aloe, Travel Razor | Stocking Stuffer
short_description: SHAVING’S NEVER BEEN EASIER— Women’s razors with a built-in moisturizing bar let you lather and shave in one easy step, without the need for shave gel.
CURVE-FOLLOWING DESIGN—4-blade razor with pivoting head hugs the contours of your legs and body for closeness and comfort.

The Schick Intuition Razor is a TRAVEL ESSENTIAL—Small razor with compact design lets you enjoy the convenience of disposable razors for women, without compromising performance. Add it to your travel size toiletries to shave on the go!
PERFECT FOR FIRST-TIME SHAVERS—Sensitive skin razor has 4 wire-wrapped blades to help minimize nicks and cuts, taking the worry out of shaving.
These travel razors for women are GENTLE ON SENSITIVE SKIN—Hypoallergenic formula is dermatologist tested and made with a touch of organic aloe to soften skin as you shave.
MINI RAZOR—If you are looking for travel essentials for women, the Intuition Go travel razor fits easily into small bags, purses, and carry-on luggage.
product_description: Disposable razor convenience meets Schick Intuition's innovative skin-moisturizing shave! No need for shave gel or refills. With a built-in moisturizing bar made with a touch of organic aloe, Intuition® Go Sensitive Care 1ct Disposable Razor lets you lather and shave in one easy step! Lightweight and convenient with a travel case compatible with all Intuition Disposable razors, Intuition Go is a must-have among your travel essentials, ensuring you're always ready for life's spontaneous moments. Intuition’s smooth-gliding 4-blade sensitive skin razor hugs the contours of your legs and body for a close, smooth shave.
